original_text: Then, for the second time, the voice said to Peter, ‘God has made these animals good for people to eat. So you must not say that it is not right to eat them.’
korean_text: 또 두 번째 소리가 있으되 하나님께서 깨끗하게 하신 것을 네가 속되다 하지 말라 하더라

sentences.original_text: Then, for the second time, the voice said to Peter
sentences.korean_translation: 그때, 두 번째로, 그 목소리가 베드로에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: God has made these animals good for people to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 이 동물들을 사람들이 먹도록 좋게 만드셨습니다

sentences.original_text: that it is not right to eat them
